attributes.action: STOP GIVING BENIFITS TO E.U CITIZENS
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: E.U citizens are coming to england and claiming housing benifits and jobseekers allowance this should be stopped as US the British tax payer pay into a system whereby money is being thrown away.

rejection.details: Please address the excessive use of capital letters; they make your petition hard to read.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
